thread.title: Trump Splits With Obama on Terror Term: ISIL Is Now ISIS
thread.title_full: Trump Splits With Obama on Terror Term: ISIL Is Now ISIS - Washington Wire - WSJ

author: Natalie Andrews
title: Trump Splits With Obama on Terror Term: ISIL Is Now ISIS
text: One difference between this year’s speech to Congress by President Donald Trump and last year’s similar speech by then-President Barack Obama? “ISIL” is now “ISIS.” In Mr. Trump’s speech Tuesday, he said he had directed the Pentagon to “develop a plan to demolish and destroy ISIS,” throwing his rhetorical weight behind the most commonly used   Kellyanne Conway 'Inadvertently' Endorsed Ivanka Trump's Fashion Line -- White House
